answer:
The eligibility criteria for publicly funded (free) flu vaccine are the same at pharmacies as public health clinics. You can use our Influenza (Flu) Clinic Finder to find clinics near you. Click on the name of the pharmacy to find info re whether an appointment is recommended or drop in allowed. If you need more info, please contact your pharmacy of choice.
Immunization Nurse
question: We normally get a free flu shot via the mass vaccination program set up through interior health as we all have asthma. There are no public health flu clinics near us anymore where we now live. How do we go about getting a free shot through the pharmacies? What do we need to take/do to qualify?
question_variation_0: how do we qualify for free flu shot
question_variation_1: how to qualify for a vaccination without a prescription
question_variation_2: how to qualify for free flu shot online
